app.views package

Submodules

app.views.auth_views module

This file contains the endpoint related to user authentication.

app.views.auth_views.serve_verifyToken() → tuple[source]

Endpoint responsible for receiving the token and verifying it via Firebase.

Returns:

(tuple): tuple containing:

Error Signature(str): If token is invalid, else the

output of wrapped function.

Status Code(int): Server status code.

app.views.object_detection_views module

This file contains the endpoint related to object detection.

app.views.object_detection_views.serve_capturePhoto() → tuple[source]

[Token required] Endpoint responsible for receiving the image, making predictions and returning them in response.

Returns:

tuple(tuple): tuple containing:

Error signature(str): If request is invalid, else None. Status Code(int): Server status code.

app.views.views module

This file contains the endpoints related to default route. (Mainly testing purposes)

ROUTE = “/”

app.views.views.serve_home() → tuple[source]

Sample endpoint returning hardcoded response.

Returns:

tuple(tuple): tuple containing:

Response(str): Hardcoded response. Status Code(int): Server status code.
